case.state: Swimming would be lovely. Don't want to get my shirt wet, though...
I love going swimming, sounds like a great idea.
It's Thanksgiving, right? Kyoko is busy stuffing herself with turkey and mashed potatoes, but here I am at this weird bar instead.
An amputee? It's so nice that you don't fall into despair from your injury.
You are an amputee, Emi? People like you are an opportune target for witches. They love feasting on those that are already weak...
All righty Ms. Heurassein. Sounds like a fancy last name.
The Inventory is pitting me against a sheep? Well, if that's how they want to play, then I have no qualms about playing with you, Leggy.
Merry Christmas, everyone! This place looks festive enough to spend the holidays in.
What's with all the spooky Halloween decorations? I wouldn't expect some spooky bar to bother decorating so much.
What are you doing, ~name~? Do do know that February the 31st isn't an actual date, do you?
Happy Valentines Day, everyone. I found some chocolates if anyone wants some.
Happy April Fools day? Hopefully this strip poker thing is all one big practical joke.
It's Saint Patrick's day, right? You're not gonna force us all to drink alcohol, will you?
This is Kyoko's favorite hangout spot. But I think she's too busy with the new DDR machine to notice us. She'll probably be bored with the kind of game we're playing.
There's a beautiful beach out there, and we're sitting down and playing card games? Don't be surprised if I leave suddenly to have fun in the water.
These hot springs are really nice. Aren't we a bit overdressed for them, though?
What's all the commotion here? Some kind of card game? Why not, I'll play. Magical Girl Sayaka Miki will enchant and destroy you.
Magical Girl Sayaka Miki is now Sayaka Miki: Knight of the Beach! A vacation from witch hunting will be quite nice.
Whoa, I never heard of this place before. I'll just consider it a reward to myself for a job well done.
A new Magical Girl? Awesome! Just don't chuck any fireballs during the game, okay?
NGL? What does that mean? Is that some kind of weird gamer slang?
An agreement in your dreams? If that doesn't mean you're in love, then I don't know what will.
What the hell is coming out of that portal! Go back from whence you came, monster!
WHY!? Why pair me with that shit smearing idiot?
~player~, is there a reason why you paired me with this ugly, disgusting idiot?
A magical girl from Paris? It always seems like Japan is the only country with magical girls. I’m Sayaka, by the way.
Strip Poker and skinny dipping? Really? Never would have suspected that this place would have it...
You're working here? Is this a maid cafe? Doesn't seem like something I'd expect them to do... Then again, neither is strip poker.
Let me guess, you're referring to the innertube.
Glad you like it. Spent a fair amount of time picking it out.
That would be my world. Creeping and stalking in the shadows, witches only cause trouble wherever they go.
Idol music isn't exactly my preferred genre, but I'm happy that I get to meet you regardless, Number One!
Actually Akko, I received my powers under the promise that I would destroy every witch I could find. You seem a bit different though. A bit less evil.
The only good witch is a dead witch, as I like to say. That doesn't offend you, does it Akko?
Don't worry, Saki. My lips are sealed about your secrets.
Magical girls aren't supposed to play strip poker either. But I guess we're both making an exception this time.
That seems like an odd thing to say. I don't like it when people hide things from me.
This game is being livestreamed? I hope nobody says something about this at school tomorrow.
You can record this game all you want. Magical Girl Sayaka Miki will do the best she can for the camera.
Of course ~player~ will trust you. Why would he not?
You’re some kinda super advanced robot? Whatever you were built for, I doubt it was to play cards with us.
Your boyfriend is a pastry chef? I made a cake once, or at least sang about a cake.
I'm getting some strange vibes from you, Alice. You clearly aren’t powerful enough to be a witch, but I still think you’re hiding something.
You call yourself a doctor? I think I’ll stick with my healing magic, thank you very much.
Ultimate Programmer? That's one hell of a title.
A scientist witch? Most witches I meet are feral monsters, so it will be interesting to battle one that's highly intelligent.
An elf? They're usually classic heroes aren't they? Never seen one as chubby as you though...
Don't worry Florina. Shy girls like you are just the kind of people I strive to protect.
Hey Spider-Woman, where’s your giant robot? Or does only Spider-Man get one of those?
Is that Spider-Woman as pertaining to Spider-Man, or are you actually a horrifying spider monster underneath that suit? I hope it’s the former.
Burn scars? Were those caused by a witch? How awful...

HK416? The hell kinda name is that? We're you transformed into a sexy anime girl? Don’t worry, I’ll return you to your true form and deliver you to your rightful owner! (Probably Homura, I know she loves her guns.)
What’s that on your shirt? Some kinda witch rune I haven’t seen before?
Trion body? I don’t know what that is, but at least you are being honest about the fact that you’re inhuman.
You brought food? I think I’ve seen Kyoko with that particular brand of rice cracker.
A sexy clown... Only a witch would desire something this horrific.
Mejare is a planet full of nothing but women? I’m guessing you have a massive witch problem, don’t you, Jura?
That cape is on fire… probably not healthy.
What is Ai-chan doing here? I’ve seen her videos before. Guess she was real all along.
Aww man, I had a feeling Kyoko was gonna be here. You aren’t my Kyoko.
You may not be my Kyoko, but you still look lovely.
You have the exact same aura as a witch, only weaker. It doesn't seem like you're a threat though?
A love fairy? The love of a witch is demented and wrong, so no thanks.
Are you a criminal, Launch? I'm not scared of you! You're nothing compared to a witch. I'll just wait for a good opportunity and haul your butt into jail, as a good hero is supposed to do!
You reek of dark magic! Lotte the witch, you are officially my enemy.
All witches are evil, even if they’re cute glasses girls. Lotte the witch, I can’t wait to exterminate you.
Mejare is a planet full of nothing but women? I’m guessing you have a massive witch problem, don’t you, Meia?
Hmmmm, you look like another witch. Not many witches can assume human form though. That's a perk you don't usually see for them.
You also fight horrible monsters, right? Angels, if I remember correctly?
I feel like we have a lot in common. Not sure why. Maybe we’re both bastions of justice?
A professional swimmer? All those years in the pool ain't gonna help you against evil witches. But that's why I, Ally of Justice Sayaka, am here.
Ugh, who’s the person that reeks of sex? Most witch barriers stink, but you’re stinkier than all of them combined.
Ping, was it? Surprisingly effeminate for what’s supposed to be some strong warrior.
What's this about a grand prize? I don't really need any money, but I could always donate it to charity.
You have a incredible powerful aura. Like that of a god. You aren’t actually a god, are you?
You sure look like a cheerful girl, don’t you Pinkie Pie? Maybe you’ll keep me happy as this game goes on.
I fought an angel before, they were an evil familiar! Your master wouldn’t happen to be a flying computer would it?
At least you’re not smiling creepily like the last angel I fought.
A wrestler? No magical girl I know fights like that, so this should be interesting.
You can change outfits on the fly? I’m guessing your duty is: “Blatant cheating”.
My soul gem is going crazy with dark magic readings… but somehow I don’t think you’re evil? Don’t know what’s giving me that idea...
A v-v-vampire? At least it’s immediately obvious that you’re a monster.
That hair and those jean shorts, you remind me of my friend Kyoko.
You look a lot like my friend Kyoko. Like a more mature version of her or something...
Whoa, what was with the stretchy arms? Now that's a Magical Girl power if ever I've seen one.
I'm fighting someone with no arms? I don't want to think about how they lost them...
You look very strong, Rinkah. I’m almost glad we’re fighting like this instead of a regular battle.
Some kinda club-wielding barbarian? I’ll crush you, be it with my blades, or with strip poker.
Fairy? I'll have you know water is my specialty. I can't use water magic, but it's thematic. Part of my transformation sequence.
It looks like you hate this place too. Another magical girl of some kind? That’s great, but it looks like we're still destined to fight…
I thought I heard that there was a warship stolen from the Japanese military recently; I’m guessing you’re it.
You must be that missing warship that the news reported about. I hope your crew is still alive, 'cause this magical girl is gonna save them all.
W-what’s up with you, Twilight? You’re not human at all… and yet you don’t seem like a familiar either...
Oh, it’s Zone-tan. I've seen your works in Kyoko’s search history.
Oh, Zone-tan. Kyoko is a big fan of your work, and It seems that this fruity club is too.
Orgy? What the hell did I just walk into?
N? Didn't I see you on a most wanted list? Your evil ways won't be tolerated by me!
Oh hey, I think I remember you. Your clothing is always sold out at the mall. Maybe you can give me a sample?
Poetry? That sounds like a lot of fun. Maybe I could join your club, Amy?
Wow, Tomoko... you look even more awkward than I am. And you don't have magical powers to fall back on...
C-Champion? As in, the strongest magical girl ever born?
We're playing strip Duel Monsters? T-that's one of Kyoko's favorite card games... I barely know how to play.
Wow, you look strong. Maybe even stronger than me?
Well Shantae, I'm Ret-2-Go as well! I hope you don't mind me stealing your catchphrase.
Whoa! Who let the talking butterfly in here?
There's a prize at the end? Amazing! Magical Girls aren't supposed to charge for their services, but this isn't exactly normal Magical Girl work, now is it?
Is this a joke?! Did my real opponent bail and put a statue in their place? SHOW YOUR FACE YOU COWARD!
Explosion master?!? That's a kinda weird type of magic, isn't it?
Whoa?! What kinda creature are you, Orendi? Last I recall, girls weren't supposed to have four arms. Or bloodshot eyes. Or claws. Or tentacles for hair. You get the idea...
Social interaction practice seminar? That's not quite what I signed up for, but I'd be happy to show you the ropes of social interaction, Bernadetta.
I'm what you'd probably call a "filthy casual", but I still like speaking with fellow gamers.
I would have assumed all those videogame tournaments would have been enough socializing for you, but what do I know?
Well, I'm glad you could finally make it, Starfire. If your friends have been begging you to come here, then this place must be awesome.
Oh... I'm so sorry. You just startled me is all. Forget what I said.
Whoa! What's with the creepy mask? Hopefully it's just an out of season halloween costume.
Hey bounty hunter, is there a bounty out on Kyubey? Because I think I can help you collect.
Hey bounty hunter, is there a bounty out on Kyubey? I suppose I could post one myself, but I don’t have much to pay you with.
At least we won't be fighting over grief seeds.
Glad to see a fellow magical girl here.
Never seen you in Mitakihara City before. You must be the guardian of another city.
What's a witch doing here? Doesn't matter either way. Guess I'm coming home with a grief seed as well.
There’s a witch here as well? Oh boy, I think I can beat this one!
A witch?!? A witch is gonna be playing with us? Does she even have the brainpower necessary to understand what's going on?
How did a witch get in here? Just let me exterminate them and we can get started with the game.
Wow that’s a lot of witches. Thankfully, It doesn’t look like I'm gonna need my sword here.
I'm gonna set a new personal record in terms of grief seed collection!
There's two empty seats here. Are we just gonna start without them?
Are we starting without everyone present? Shouldn't we wait for them?
I kinda feel guilty starting without everyone present. But rules are rules.
It doesn’t look like I’m gonna need my sword here. Though whether that’s a good thing or not is up in the air.
Did I hear something about this being a strip poker game? That's so obviously a joke! Nobody would ever play strip poker willingly, riiiiiiiight?
What kind of games do you play here, I wonder? Video, board, or card games?
I didn't expect to see card games in this fruity club. You never know what to expect, I suppose...
This was kind of an impulse decision, so you better not make me regret this.
I heard some Mitakihara High students talk about this place... and immediately get detention. Guess it's time to figure out why that is...
Wow... Is that all from me? I would never have expected to be such a positive influence on your viewers. They must have a magical girl fetish...
Swap cards, are you kidding? My hand is perfect as is!
I'd be a fool to get rid of a hand like this!
I'm sticking with this hand, it's great just the way it is.
I only need to swap one card, and that will be all for me.
Just let me swap out this one card, and I'll get back to winning the game.
Just one new card for me.
~cards~ cards for me.
I'll take ~cards~.
~cards~ new cards, please.
~cards~ cards would be good right about now.
Give me ~cards~.
I'm gonna need ~cards~ new cards.
M-moment of truth. ~cards~ cards please.
I'll exchange ~cards~ cards.
It sounds like you always need yours around to transform though. I don’t need Kyubey’s help to transform.
I've been reading this cute little manga lately about a mermaid warrior fighting against evil. Kinda like me.
Now a big vine? What exactly do you intend to do with that?
You remind me a lot of Madoka’s cat, Amy was it? Might just be the ears. Or did another magical girl wish to make you human?
You’re reminding me way too much of Madoka’s cat, and I doubt that is a coincidence.
What type of spells do you cast anyway?
What are these Akumas you keep going on about? Are they what you call witches where you come from?
What the hell is an Akuma? Are they related to witches, or something totally different?
Please don’t tell me that’s the blood of another magical girl.
Blood? Fake, human, or gulp magical girl?
So you really are a vampire… Try and eat me and I’ll cut your head off.
Adventure? Oh yeah, this is an adventure all right. A noble magical girl playing strip poker in a den of depravity.
I suppose my first real adventure was the first witch I fought. It was a flying computer, attacking me with her angel familiars, but I managed to pull through and vanquish her.
Did you ever see a white cat looking thing named Kyubey when you were younger, Jura? Just curious.
You know, horrid monsters? Flying computers? Giant worms? No?
A magical girl in a bodysuit? No magical girl I know wears a bodysuit. That’s kinda neat.
So Marinette, I gotta ask, what did you wish for to get your powers? Or did your wish turn out badly like it did mine?
Did you ever see a white cat looking thing named Kyubey when you were younger, Meia? Just curious.
You know, horrid monsters? Flying computers? Giant worms? No?
You talk about putting on a show. I’m guessing it’s some kind of naked show, but if my luck holds out, I’m gonna have no part of it.
If you are using magic to hide your true form, then you’re probably some kinda monster. I specialize in dealing with monsters!
(Purple skin, why does Twilight have purple skin?)
I can’t say I’m surprised that a hentai artist is here. Everyone here probably loves your lewd drawings, but not me.
Japan is always presented as the only place for magical girls, but it’s nice to see one from another part of the globe.
So you’re French, Marinette? I always wanted to go to Europe. But not Germany, don’t want to go there. Not sure why.
A perfect hand right away? This will be easy.
Things are already off to a wonderful start.
That suit looks so tight. I'm glad I'm not wearing spandex.
There’s not a single magical girl I know that wears spandex. Maybe it’s just not a good material for magical girls.
Why don’t magical girls wear bodysuits? I think it’s because they aren’t cute.
Hey, Marinette, you’re actually wearing a bodysuit? I never see magical girls wearing those.
No witch can beat the both of us ~name~!
Let's see how this other magical girl handles Magical Girl Sayaka Miki!
Are you here for grief seeds, ~name~? Or just to have fun?
Whoa, a Royal Flush? Finally, things are starting to go my way!
I'm not stripping this round.
There’s no way I could lose now.
A good hand for a good, heroic magical girl. Madoka would be so proud!
I’ve played cards with Madoka before, so I know that this is a good hand… N-not strip poker mind you.
Yay, I've got this in the bag.
Sayaka’s coming to get you, your clothes that is.
My blade can cut through Familiars with ease, but I won't need it with cards like these.
Nothing can stop me now.
I couldn't wish for cards this good. (Seriously Kyubey, could I always get hands like these?)
My magic won’t help me win at strip poker, but it doesn’t look like I would need it anyway.
Now this is what Magical girls are made of, justice and high quality poker hands... Wait, that doesn't sound right...
What could possibly go wrong?
After I win, I'll celebrate by going to Mami's tea party.
These cards? For a magical girl like me? You shouldn't have.
This hand is music to my ears. Like a nice Bach piece.
The witch doesn’t stand a chance.
I can do it, I'm gonna take that witch down.
Your grief seed is mine, you hear me?
No witch has escaped my wrath yet, and I'm not going to quit now.
Your grief seeds all belong to me now.
Even against so many witches, I'm still doing great.
You witches shall feel the wrath of a fully powered magical girl: ME!
I'm guessing strip poker isn’t any of you witches’ specialties.
I've never fought multiple witches at once before, but it will be as easy as pie with this hand.
I'm guessing strip poker isn’t the specialty of any of you witches.
I may have my legs exposed, but that’s all that will be exposed for now.
Plenty of heroes fought with bare feet, It doesn't faze me at all.
This would have came in handy when I still had my boobs covered.
This is fine, I think?
Looking kinda underdressed here. But I guess that's the point...
Hey, this is actually kinda good. Hopefully this magical girl can still win.
A good hand. But is it good enough?
Funny joke, dealer. I could have used this when I still had my dress.
Phew, dodged a hit there.
None of your hands are powerful enough to defeat Magical Girl Sayaka Miki!
This will work right? It just has to work.
I became a magical girl to protect people, not to play strip poker with lewd people like you!
With hands like this, I can probably still win! But at what cost?
To be a Magical Girl is to show bravery even against the most impossible odds!
I shouldn't be mad about a hand this good, but then again, I shouldn't be baring by breasts for you all!
Where's the music? I always work better with music. You'd all be naked now if there was some Chopin in the background.
I may be the only one topless, but that won’t be the case for long.
Now someone else might get to experience my embarrassment.
I can’t protect my modesty, but I can at least protect my dignity.
I've lost all my clothing, but I'm not losing this last hand.
I may be naked, but what does that matter? There’s still a chance of victory, and I’m ready and willing to exploit it.
Do I actually like being naked for you all? (No, that's completely and utterly illogical!)
We had a nude modeling class once... I wonder if they felt what I'm feeling now?
I'm safe. Naked, but safe.
Phew.
Haha, funny joke, giving me the best hand when I'm already nude.
Heroes may experience trials and suffering, but they'll always win in the end! And this hand proves just that!
A naked hero is still a hero, and don't you forget it!
I can't defend the city like this! I'd get arrested for public indecency.
It sounds like you always need yours around to transform though. I don’t need Kyubey’s help to transform.
I've been reading this cute little manga lately, about a mermaid warrior fighting against evil. Kinda like me.
Now a big vine? What exactly do you intend to do with that?
You remind me a lot of Madoka’s cat, Amy was it? Might just be the ears. Or did another magical girl wish to make you human?
You’re reminding me way too much of Madoka’s cat, and I doubt that is a coincidence.
What type of spells do you cast anyway? Spirit magic?
Please don’t tell me that’s the blood of another magical girl.
Blood? Fake, human, or gulp magical girl?
So you really are a vampire… Try and eat me and I’ll cut your head off.
Did you ever see a white cat looking thing named Kyubey when you were younger, Jura? Just curious.
You know, horrid monsters? Flying computers? Giant worms? No?
A magical girl in a bodysuit? No magical girl I know wears a bodysuit. That’s kinda neat.
So Marinette, I gotta ask, what did you wish for to get your powers? Or did your wish turn out badly like it did mine?
Did you ever see a white cat looking thing named Kyubey when you were younger, Meia? Just curious.
You know, horrid monsters? Flying computers? Giant worms? No?
You talk about putting on a show. I’m guessing it’s some kind of naked show, but if my luck holds out, I’m gonna have no part of it.
If you are using magic to hide your true form, then you’re probably some kinda monster. I specialize in dealing with monsters!
(Purple skin, why does Twilight have purple skin?)
I can’t say I’m surprised that a hentai artist is here. Everyone here probably loves your lewd drawings, but not me.
That suit looks so tight. I'm glad I'm not wearing spandex.
There’s not a single magical girl I know that wears spandex. Maybe it’s just not a good material for magical girls.
Why don’t magical girls wear bodysuits? I think it’s because they aren’t cute.
Hey, Marinette, you’re actually wearing a bodysuit? I never see magical girls wearing those.
Don’t worry, with your powers and mine, this witch doesn’t stand a chance.
It’s a funny coincidence that I have backup, but it all works out.
Figuring out how to split the grief seed might be tough, but let’s not think about that now.
For a first hand, this could be worse.
Such a mediocre start? Oh well.
I wish Mami or Madoka were here. They’d cheer me on, and wouldn’t ogle my breasts.
With cards like these, you better watch out!
A mediocre hand… Magical girls don’t usually see stuff like this.
Not the best, but I’m sure this will work. (It just has to work.)
Hey, at least I'm not the worst player here!
It’ll all work out in the end. It always does for Magical Girls like me.
Magical girls need a little suspense, I suppose. Can't win all the time, am I right?
Hey ~player~, you think you can beat this? I doubt you can.
This is fine, I can still win.
There are worse things I could be doing now. Like finals week.
No more witch hunting for me today! Now it's floozy hunting time!
I can work with this. At least it's not a giant spider witch!
A mediocre hand… I’ve battled worse than this.
With my magic sword named... well, it doesn't have a name, but it's still the best thing a magical girl could ever have.
Mitakihara is such a lovely city. There aren't many lewd places like this, that's for sure.
I'm sure that the witch is in a similar situation.
I'm not scared at all! I'm sure that witch playing with me has a garbage hand.
Looks like it’s a toss-up between me and the witch.
You witches sure seem to be good at this game. But I'm better.
Wouldn’t have expected any witch to have the brains for this game. You're all naked, deranged animals!
Witches playing strip poker with me? Wait until I tell Kyoko about this place. She'll probably want to murder you all even more than me.
I’m not comfortable exposing myself to anybody... But I promised I'd stay, and so I will.
This might work, but I've lost with better cards than this.
Hmm… this will have to do, I suppose.
(I wonder how Homura would handle this? Probably use her magic and escape… But I can't run away, I must be brave!)
This isn’t what I became a magical girl for. Not even close.
I wish Mami or Madoka were here. They’d cheer me on, and wouldn’t ogle my breasts.
I’d love to fight some puffballs right about now. They wouldn’t strip me naked.
I'm never going to lose! Except for when I do...
(What would Madoka do? She'd probably lose on purpose so nobody else had to strip. But I won't lose, I need to win!)
It's okay, honestly. Could be worse, but I'm not feeling great about this hand.
I'm a heroic magical girl, and my breasts being exposed will not change that!
I don’t want to be the only one topless.
I feel kinda embarrassed being the only one topless.
I hope you’re enjoying my boobs. I sure as hell don't enjoy showing them to you.
If someone wants to brick right now, that would be great.
Could someone else lose? Please?
I'm naked, and I'm not sure this last hand can protect me...
Average. An average hand is the last thing I need right now.
I need a lot more than this measly pair if I want to keep my dignity. Though that's kinda impossible at this point.
This hand isn’t technically bad. But I want it to be a lot better. Any chance of losing is too much in a game like this...
Ugh.
Even without any clothing, I will still find the power within myself to defeat you all!
I don't need clothing to defend Mitakihara City! I would just greatly prefer it, that's all.
So this is what I get for risking my life battling witches? What a wonderful gift!
Not all witches are bad? Of course all witches are bad. You’re all gross and slimy and evil! Offense intended.
It sounds like you always need yours around to transform though. I don’t need Kyubey’s help to transform.
The name’s Sayaka, Magical Girl extraordinaire! Slayer of witches and defender of innocents. It is my sacred duty to keep Mitakihara City clean and witch free! You can thank me for that later.
I've been reading this cute little manga lately, about a mermaid warrior fighting against evil. Kinda like me.
Now a big vine? What exactly do you intend to do with that?
You remind me a lot of Madoka’s cat, Amy was it? Might just be the ears. Or did another magical girl wish to make you human?
You’re reminding me way too much of Madoka’s cat, and I doubt that is unintentional.
What type of spells do you cast anyway? Spirit magic?
Please don’t tell me that’s the blood of another magical girl.
Blood? Fake, human, or gulp magical girl?
So you really are a vampire… Try and eat me and I’ll cut your head off.
Did you ever see a white cat looking thing named Kyubey when you were younger, Jura? Just curious.
You know, horrid monsters? Flying computers? Giant worms? No?
A magical girl in a bodysuit? No magical girl I know wears a bodysuit. That’s kinda neat.
So Marinette, I gotta ask, what did you wish for to get your powers? Or did your wish turn out badly like it did mine?
Did you ever see a white cat looking thing named Kyubey when you were younger, Meia? Just curious.
You know, horrid monsters? Flying computers? Giant worms? No?
You talk about putting on a show. I’m guessing it’s some kind of naked show, but if my luck holds out, I’m gonna have no part of it.
If you are using magic to hide your true form, then you’re probably some kinda monster. I specialize in dealing with monsters!
(Purple skin, why does Twilight have purple skin?)
I can’t say I’m surprised that a hentai artist is here. Everyone here probably loves your lewd drawings, but not me.
I did hear a buzzing sound. I think it might be a witch’s familiar. Don't be ridiculous, there's no way a bee could get in here.
Hey Fake Kyoko, can your detective skills determine what I'm gonna strip next?
Fake Kyoko, can you guess how my good my hand is?
Fake Kyoko, can you really determine how good my hand is, or are you just guessing?

state.text: Another bad hand? You can’t be serious.

case.state: I was stupid, so stupid to come here.
That suit looks so tight. I'm glad I'm not wearing spandex.
There’s not a single magical girl I know that wears spandex. Maybe it’s just not a good material for magical girls.
Why don’t magical girls wear bodysuits? I think it’s because they aren’t cute.
Hey, Marinette, you’re actually wearing a bodysuit? I never see magical girls wearing those.
Don’t worry, with your powers and mine, this witch doesn’t stand a chance.
It’s a funny coincidence that I have backup, but it all works out.
Figuring out how to split the grief seed might be tough, but let’s not think about that now.
A bad hand already?
I hope this isn’t a sign of things to come.
Starting me off with a hand like this? I better get a straight in the next round...
What have I gotten myself into?
A bad hand… But Mami wouldn’t be scared by this, so neither am I.
Knights of justice aren’t supposed to get hands like these.
I think I may have made a big mistake.
Such a stupid move on my part.
This is not going to end well.
Kyubey, is it too late to wish for a hand that isn’t garbage?
Well, that was a dumb idea.
Sniff... Why are you getting all the good cards?
